500.description: Generic internal server error. Try again later.

400.description: General client error. The request was not understood by the server, generally due to bad syntax.

INCORRECT_VALUE_TYPE.message: The JSON value type for the field is incorrect. For example, a string instead of an integer.

MISSING_REQUIRED_PARAMETER.message: A required path, query, or body parameter is missing.

INVALID_RANGE.message: Specified time range is incorrect. For example, the end time is before the start time.

CONFLICTING_PARAMETERS.message: 1 or more of the request parameters conflict with each other.

401.message: An authentication error. Request had a missing, malformed, or invalid authorization data

402.message: The subscription of account has lapsed

403.message: The resource requested is not available with your permits

415.message: The server doesn't accept the submitted content-type.

429.message: The request was not accepted because the application has exceeded the rate limit.
